documentation.title: KoolTabsItem Class [Javascript]
documentation.metadescription: KoolTabs - Powerful PHP Tab Menu - Fast rendering, Flexible CSS Style and Search Engine Friendly make KoolTabs the great PHP Tab Menu solution for your website navigation system.
documentation.metakeywords: php tab, php tab menu, php tabstrip, ajax tab menu

method.name: isEnabled
method.shortdesc: Return true if the tab is enabled
method.longdesc: Return true if the tab is enabled
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        //Check if the tab is disabled
        if(!home_tab.isEnabled())
        {
            alert("Home tab is disabled");
        }		
		
    }
</script>

method.name: enable
method.shortdesc: Set whether the tab is enabled
method.longdesc: Set whether the tab is enabled
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        //Disable the tab
        home_tab.enable(false);
    }
</script>

method.name: isSelected
method.shortdesc: Return true if the tab is selected
method.longdesc: Return true if the tab is selected
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        //Check if the tab is selected
        if(!home_tab.isSelected())
        {
            alert("This tab is not selected");
        }				
    }
</script>

method.name: select
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Make home tab selected
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        home_tab.select();
    }
</script>

method.name: unselect
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        //Make home tab unselected
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        home_tab.unselect();
    }
</script>

method.name: getParentId
method.shortdesc: Get the id of parent tab
method.longdesc: Get the id of parent tab
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        alert(home_tab.getParentId());
    }
</script>

method.name: moveToFront
method.shortdesc: Move a tab to in front of another same level tab
method.longdesc: Move a tab to in front of another same level tab
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        home_tab.moveToFont("service");//Move the home tab to in front of service tab
    }
</script>

method.name: moveToBehind
method.shortdesc: Move a tab to behind of another same level tab
method.longdesc: Move a tab to behind of another same level tab
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        home_tab.moveToBehind("service");//Move the home tab to behind of service tab
    }
</script>

method.name: getChildIds
method.shortdesc: Get the id of parent tab
method.longdesc: Get the id of parent tab
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
        var home_tab = kts.getTab("home");        
        var _childids = home_tab.getChildIds();
        for(var i in _childids)
        {
            alert(_childids[i]);
        }
    }
</script>
